thread.section_title: Hotel Augustin - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in good location - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gillianweatherburn
title: Lovely hotel in good location
text: We unfortunately only stayed one night to celebrate a family birthday. The staff were great and upgraded the birthday boys room for us. It had a boutique feel to it. The rooms were lovely and bright, with a nice bathroom and great shower. Although the rooms were not big they were fine for a weekend stay and had everything you needed including a fridge with complementary soft drinks. Comfy bed with good pillows.We did not have breakfast, but it was really busy so I would guess it was ok.the location was good for us, walkable to wherever we wanted to go. The metro was 5 mins away if you wanted it though. Reasonably priced for Paris. Definitely recommend.
